docs.snippet: Custom hath not staled the infinite variety of the departures of the Highland Guard, for yesterday, when they bade farewell to our City, they were greeted with an ovation, such as has seldom been witnessed, even in these stirring times.

docs.snippet: "The force here is about 7,000, all prime Pennsylvania Volunteers, in the best of health and spirits. Chambersburgh is in Franklin County, Penn., fortythree miles north from Harper's Ferry, which is a point of some interest at present.

headline.main: HOW MATTERS STAND AT CHAMBERSBURGH.; A correspondent of the Philadelphia Ledger writes from Chambersburgh on May 20:

docs.lead_paragraph: "The force here is about 7,000, all prime Pennsylvania Volunteers, in the best of health and spirits. Chambersburgh is in Franklin County, Penn., fortythree miles north from Harper's Ferry, which is a point of some interest at present.

docs.snippet: As an exposition of its life, the literature of the South is a study. For even in our Slave States the thoughts of scholarly men, who have the leisure and inclination for reflection, are, in due process of time, translated into the prose of every-day...
docs.lead_paragraph: As an exposition of its life, the literature of the South is a study. For even in our Slave States the thoughts of scholarly men, who have the leisure and inclination for reflection, are, in due process of time, translated into the prose of every-day conduct. The vagaries of CALHOUN, and the Utopian speculations of De Bow's Review, are to-day crystalizing in the edicts of the Confederate Congress and the preclamations of JEFFERSON DAVIS.

docs.snippet: Gov. BANKS has signified his acceptance of the Major-Generalship, but has not yet received his commission. He goes into the field at once.

headline.main: LATEST NEWS OF THE REBELLION.; SPECIAL DISPATCH FROM WASHINGTON.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. BANKS has signified his acceptance of the Major-Generalship, but has not yet received his commission. He goes into the field at once.

docs.snippet: Mr. JOSEPH JEFFERSON. This admirable artist leaves us to-day in the California steamer. He contemplates making a tour of the auriferous regions, and possibly of pushing across the Pacific to Australia, where actors are always in demand, and never...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. JOSEPH JEFFERSON. This admirable artist leaves us to-day in the California steamer. He contemplates making a tour of the auriferous regions, and possibly of pushing across the Pacific to Australia, where actors are always in demand, and never fail to reap a rich harvest. We can ill afford to part with Mr. JEFFERSON. His style is so genial and ele- ...
